title: RADAR-base protocol for the aRMT app questionnaire delivery
description: A protocol for the RADAR-base aRMT app describes what questionnaires should be proposed to participants at what time. It controls notification times, label text and the questionnaire sources. The reference questionnaire app is described on the wiki page https://radar-base.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/RAD/pages/463241217/Protocol+Schedule.

version.title: Protocol version
version.description: Update this version whenever the aRMT app should read any changes. Use semantic versioning for the version.

schemaVersion.title: The version of this schema
schemaVersion.description: The version of this schema describing the protocol structure. Use semantic versioning for the version.

name.title: Protocol set name
name.description: The name of the set of protocols. It should match the study that the protocol is being used in.

healthIssues.title: Health issues
healthIssues.description: Study area of health issues that are covered by the questionnaire.

protocols.title: Questionnaire protocols
protocols.description: List of questionnaire protocols in the study protocol.

showIntroduction.title: Show an introduction
showIntroduction.description: True if an introduction to the questionnaire should be shown, false otherwise. The contents of the introduction are defined by the 'startText' property.

showInCalendar.title: Whether the questionnaire should show up on the task calendar.
showInCalendar.description: True if the questionnaire should show up on the task calendar and show task information, or false, if it should be hidden (for example, for randomised questionnaires).

isDemo.title: Whether the questionnaire is only a demo
isDemo.description: True if the questionnaire is only a demo, so the data for the questionnaire should not be sent to the server.

order.title: Order for showing tasks in the home page
order.description: Order for choosing tasks to prioritize in the home page when multiple tasks are pending and order for showing clinical tasks, where 0 has the highest order/priority.

questionnaire.title: Questionnaire to use
questionnaire.description: Reference to the questionnaire specification. This defines the questions, field type, branching logic etc.

name.title: Questionnaire name
name.description: Name should match file name under the URL provided in the repository property.

avsc.title: Schema
avsc.description: Avro Schema name as defined in RADAR-Schemas.

startText.title: Start text
startText.description: Text shown in the app before starting a questionnaire. Enable it with the 'showIntroduction' property.

^[a-z][a-z](-[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$.description: Text in the language corresponding to property name. The property name should be a ISO 639-1 two letter language code or BCP-47 language tag.

endText.title: End text
endText.description: Text shown in the app after finishing a questionnaire.

^[a-z][a-z](-[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$.description: Text in the language corresponding to property name. The property name should be a ISO 639-1 two letter language code or BCP-47 language tag.

warn.title: Warning text
warn.description: Warning shown when the questionnaire has not been filled.

^[a-z][a-z](-[a-zA-Z0-9]+)*$.description: Text in the language corresponding to property name. The property name should be a ISO 639-1 two letter language code or BCP-47 language tag.

protocol.title: Questionnaire protocol
protocol.description: Protocol including schedule for the questionnaire.

repeatProtocol.title: Protocol repetition
repeatProtocol.description: How frequently the protocol should be repeated for each participant.

unit.title: Amount unit
unit.description: Duration unit attached to the amount property in repeatProtocol.

amount.title: Amount of time
amount.description: Modified by the unit property in repeatProtocol.

repeatQuestionnaire.title: Questionnaire repetitions
repeatQuestionnaire.description: What time of day questionnaires should be posed. The day that questionnaires are posed are specified with repeatProtocol, the local time is defined by this repeatQuestionnaire (units offset from repeat from midnight repeatProtocol day).

unit.title: Amount unit
unit.description: Duration unit attached to the unitsFromZero property in repeatQuestionnaire.

unitsFromZero.title: Times starting at midnight
unitsFromZero.description: Times, starting from midnight, that a protocol should be suggested. The date of the midnight in question is determined by repeatProtocol.

items.title: Amount of time
items.description: Modified by the unit property in repeatQuestionnaire

clinicalProtocol.title: Clinical protocol
clinicalProtocol.description: Defines repetitions of the protocol after a clinical visit.

requiresInClinicCompletion.title: Requires in-clinic completion.
requiresInClinicCompletion.description: Whether the test should be performed during a clinical visit.

unit.title: Amount unit
unit.description: Duration unit attached to the unitsFromZero property in repeatAfterClinicVisit.

unitsFromZero.title: Times
unitsFromZero.description: Times, starting from clinic visit, that a protocol should start.

items.title: Amount of time
items.description: Modified by the unit property in repeatAfterClinicVisit

reminders.title: Reminder schedule
reminders.description: When and how often to remind participants that a questionnairie still has to be filled out.

unit.title: Amount unit
unit.description: Duration unit modifing the amount property in reminders.

amount.title: Amount of time
amount.description: Time to wait after the previous notification. Modified by the unit property in reminders.
